name: Pub/Sub Avro to BigQuery Streaming Flex Template.
description: A streaming flex template to read from Pub/Sub Avro and write to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub Subscription ID.
parameters.helpText: The Subscription ID of the input Pub/Sub subscription to consume from.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Dataset and Table Name.
parameters.helpText: The name of the BigQuery output dataset and table name separated by a period.

parameters.name: dead_letter_topic
parameters.label: Dead Letter Topic ID.
parameters.helpText: The Topic ID of the output topic to write records to that failed during processing.
